sentences.sContent: He didn’t look the sort of man to forgive and forget (= forgive someone and no longer think about it ) .
sentences.sCn: 他看上去不是那种不记仇的人。

phrases.pCn: 请原谅我；请你谅解我吧

trans.tranCn: (过去式 forgave, 过去分词 forgiven) 原谅；饶恕
trans.tranOther: to stop being angry with someone and stop blaming them, although they have done something wrong
